summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard Northeast from Northeast 45th Street to approximately 3,700 feet southerly thereof; and a certain other avenue; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18916 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
